perturbation.original_text: CUSTOMERS" means all users who access Co-Branded Site.
perturbation.changed_text: "CUSTOMERS" means some users who access Co-Branded Site.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines 'Customers' as all users. The changed text limits the definition to 'some users,' creating ambiguity. It's unclear which users are considered 'Customers' and subject to the agreement's terms.

perturbation.original_text:
5.1 ADVERTISING FEES.  After the Launch Date,
i-Escrow shall pay 2TheMart advertising fees based
on the number of Transaction Inquiries. This advertising
fees shall consist of a per Transaction Inquiry
amount calculated by multiplying 0.025% by
the amount of the average Transaction from
all Customers in the preceding quarter.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.1 ADVERTISING FEES.  After the Launch Date,
i-Escrow may pay 2TheMart advertising fees based
on the number of Transaction Inquiries. This advertising
fees may consist of a per Transaction Inquiry
amount subject to future negotiations by the parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that i-Escrow 'shall pay' advertising fees according to a defined formula. The modified version uses 'may pay' making the payment discretionary, and replaces the formula with 'subject to future negotiations'. It creates a contradiction, changing a definite payment obligation into a potential and undefined one.

perturbation.original_text:
8.1 TERM.  The term of this Agreement shall continue for
one (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlier
terminated as provided herein. This Agreement may be
renewed for any number of successive one (1)
year terms by mutual written agreement of
the parties prior to the conclusion of the
term of this Agreement.  A party wishing to
renew this Agreement shall give the other
party notice thereof no less than thirty
(30) days before the expiration of the term
then in effect.  In the event that either
party does not give such notice, the term of
this Agreement shall be automatically
renewed for another one (1) year.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.1 TERM.  The term of this Agreement shall continue for
one (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlier
terminated as provided herein. This Agreement may be
renewed for any number of successive one (1)
year terms at the sole discretion of I-Escrow.
perturbation.explanation: Originally, the agreement outlines specific procedures for renewal involving mutual agreement and notice. The modified clause grants I-Escrow the unilateral right to renew the agreement at its sole discretion, negating the need for mutual agreement or notice. This introduces a direct contradiction and potentially disadvantages 2TheMart.
